attributes.action: Stop selling fireworks to the public and only allow licensed people to use
attributes.additional_details: More people and animals get injured each year because of carelessness and stupidity of adults and children setting fireworks off in a dangerous way. Teenagers often post them through letterboxes and aim them at people and it’s only a matter of time before they kill someone with them. It has terrified domestic and wild animals to the point of death. They are very unnecessary for general public and would be much better used for organised displays instead.
attributes.background: Make it illegal for general public to set off fireworks and only allow organised displays.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
